title: Hi got my 64 back from blasters , start list of bits needed, complete front beam yes everything, wheels, double cargo do

posts.content: Oors, gearbox, engine, n/s wheel arch , complete steering , box, wheel, stalk ect, engine hatch, engine valance, fish eye indicators, rear of rear arch tub closing panels, n/s rear corner section, preferred up to swage , battery trays, cab doors glass , any help greatly appreciated Trev

I've got a LHD steering box available for sale in relevant section, but is yours LHD or RHD?

Steve

I've got 4 15" solid wheels, I think they are originally from a 60s Beetle. Correct wide 5 bolt pattern, they are fitted with 175 50 and 185 60 tyres. Painted black with a white rim, I can post a pic if you're interested.
What gearbox are you after? I have a stock one for Â£150 with shafts and brakes.

Hi Steve ,thanks buts its rhd,
rusty1962 wrote:I've got a LHD steering box available for sale in relevant section, but is yours LHD or RHD?

Steve
hi double yes pics please, pm me cost ect ta Trevor
Thanks Paul, think I've managed to buy a beetle, with engine & gearbox, don't know if they fit? But if not ,got another project
